alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 16 at 12:06PM AKDT until March 16 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW FOLLOWED BY HEAVY RAIN FOR SOUTHEAST ALASKA... .Snow changed to rain near sea level in Haines and Skagway early Thursday morning with a strong wind shift to the south. Temperatures remain below freezing out the highways with snow continuing fall. For Yakutat, the main plume of moisture will shift to the west over that area Thursday evening with greater precipitation rates. Snowfall in Yakutat will depend if the wind direction remains E-NE and limits warming. If a shift to the south happens earlier, then a change to rain will occur. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph near Lynn Canal. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A foot of snow was reported near the borders on both Highways Thursday morning. Snow levels will continue to rise through the late afternoon and evening to between 800-1300ft
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
